      public boolean registerTeam(String name, String country, String nameTechnicalDirector)
      Description: This method registers a team in the group Pre: The team is not registered in the group Post: The team is registered in the group
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the team
      country - The country of the team
      nameTechnicalDirector - The name of the technical director of the team
      Returns:
      boolean True if the team was registered successfully, false otherwise

    • buildFixture

      public void buildFixture(LocalDate startDate)
      Description: This method builds the fixture for the group by generating all possible matches between the teams, shuffling them, and distributing them across three match days. Pre: The group has at least two teams. Pos: The group has a fixture with three match days, each containing two matches.
      Parameters:
      startDate - The start date for the first match day.

    • showFormattedFixture

      public String showFormattedFixture()
      Description: This method returns a formatted string representing the fixture of the group. Pre: The group must have at least one match day initialized. Post: A formatted string with the fixture of the group is returned.
      Returns:
      String A formatted string with the fixture of the group.
